name: 3 One-Off Push Data to Exploration Zone

activities.name: Execute Copy from Lake to Exploration Zone
activities.description:
To copy files back to exploration, specify the:

Required:
Initative name for the Exploration Zone
Source Zone the data comes from (usually raw zone)
Source System the data comes from

Optional Parameters:

Source Table - this is the Source Table the data comes from. If this is left blank, all tables in the source folder will be pushed back

LastUTCWaterMark - A Date modified from watermark in UTC, when you want to copy back a certain date range. If this is blank it will copy everything from the Table folder. (eg 2022-06-01T22:28:45.9674582Z)

if ExplorationPath  is specified, it overrides the ExplorationZoneInitiative\SourceSystem path. This parameter is used by the 'Push to Incremental' step of the Ingestion Pipeline that pushes newly incoming data to the exploration zone.

pipeline.referenceName: 3_2 Copy from Lake to Exploration Zone
